BLOCKCLOCK™ mini







Buy Now <3

          BLOCKCLOCK mini is Bitcoiner's new favorite display art device!
Track prices from exchanges, 
          see blocks as they are published by miners, and connect the Opendime to display balance, 
          fiat value, and deposit QR codes on a timeless 7 E-Ink digital display. 
          What time is it? It's Moscow time
